SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IUserManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserManager
public interface IUserManager
Manages user authentication, session, and user data operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword()
    Changes the password of the current user.
    User
    findUserLogin(String ic, String pw)
    Finds and returns a user matching the given credentials.
    User
    getcurrentUser()
    Retrieves the currently logged-in user.
    User
    getUser(String nric)
    Retrieves a user by NRIC.
    boolean
    login()
    Logs the user into the system.
    void
    logout()
    Logs the current user out of the system.
    void
    printAllUser()
     
    void
    reIntialise()
    Reinitializes the user manager state, e.g.
    User
    searchUser_Type(Class<?> clazz, String name)
    Searches for a user by class type and identifier.
    void
    setList(List<User> list)
    Sets the internal list of users.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      void changePassword()
      Changes the password of the current user.

    • login

      boolean login()
      Logs the user into the system.
      Returns:
      true if login successful, false otherwise

    • logout

      void logout()
      Logs the current user out of the system.

    • searchUser_Type

      User searchUser_Type(Class<?> clazz, String name) throws Exception
      Searches for a user by class type and identifier.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class type of user (e.g., Applicant.class, HDBOfficer.class)
      name - the identifier (NRIC) of the user
      Returns:
      the User object if found
      Throws:
      Exception - if lookup fails or user not found

    • setList

      void setList(List<User> list)
      Sets the internal list of users.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of User objects to manage

    • getcurrentUser

      User getcurrentUser()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      the User object representing the current user

    • findUserLogin

      User findUserLogin(String ic, String pw)
      Finds and returns a user matching the given credentials.
      Parameters:
      ic - the NRIC of the user
      pw - the password of the user
      Returns:
      the matching User object

    • reIntialise

      void reIntialise()
      Reinitializes the user manager state, e.g. clears session or reloads data.

    • printAllUser

      void printAllUser()

    • getUser

      User getUser(String nric)
      Retrieves a user by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the user
      Returns:
      the matching User object
